name: magicwand-shared

scripts.release: npm run build && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "$npm_config_message" && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit --amend --no-edit && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags

description: After making changes run: npm run release --message='Your commit message'
